about_the_game:
Elliot is a troubled boy with a troubled mind, desperately clinging to the world around him. What would happen if his reality were called into question? Where do lies begin and end? Learn the different truths at play over the multiple endings the game has to offer.

Voice Acting

My Dear Delirium comes fully voice acted! The incredible cast are the stars of this show, so please enjoy as they bring each of the characters to life.

Multiple Endings

The game features two distinct endings! You can expect a short and sweet playthrough of each, with the whole game completable in an hour.

Animated CGs

A number of CGs within My Dear Delirium have been given that extra flair, making them even more impactful when it counts!

content_descriptors.notes: This game deals with themes of trauma, mental health, and manipulation.
